column4: don't uninstall firefox 2, just install firefox 3 using the manual instructions at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FirefoxNewVersion

the manual install directions i linked to you, https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FirefoxNewVersion

because i have seen it cause problems for people and leaving it there won't cause any problems
